Detailed Description

Packet that is send as reply to the AllCountryRequest-packet.

After the normal header this packet contains
PosSizeComment
REPLY_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes Number of countries
For each country 4 bytes mapID
4 bytes map version
16 bytes boundingBox
4 bytes Number of strings
For each string 4 bytes String index
